import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { X, User, Crown, Info, HelpCircle, Shield, Eye, LogOut, ChevronRight, Zap, Bot, Coffee, BookOpen, LayoutDashboard, Beer, Scan, Percent, List, PlusCircle, Store, Key, Activity } from 'lucide-react'; import { UserProfile, UserRole } from '../../types'; import { isSystemAdmin } from '../../types/auth_schema'; interface SidebarProps { isOpen: boolean; onClose: () => void; userProfile: UserProfile; viewMode: 'player' | 'owner'; setViewMode: (mode: 'player' | 'owner') => void; onLogout: () => void; onLogin: (mode?: 'login' | 'signup') => void; onProfileClick: () => void; userPoints?: number; } export const Sidebar: React.FC = ({ isOpen, onClose, userProfile, viewMode, setViewMode, onLogout, onLogin, onProfileClick, userPoints = 0 }) => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [legalOpen, setLegalOpen] = useState(false); // --- DERIVED STATE --- const isOwner = ['owner', 'admin', 'super-admin'].includes(userProfile.role); const isSuperAdmin = isSystemAdmin(userProfile); // --- NAVIGATION CONFIG --- const handleNavigation = (path: string) => { navigate(path); onClose(); }; const renderPlayerMode = () => ( <> {/* 1. Header: Player Card */}
{/* Abstract Pattern overlay */}
{ if (userProfile.role === 'guest') { onLogin('login'); } else { onProfileClick(); } onClose(); }} >
{userProfile.displayName || (userProfile.role === 'guest' ? 'Guest Player' : 'Player One')} {userProfile.role === 'guest' ? 'Tap to Sign In' : `${userPoints.toLocaleString()} Pts`}
{/* 1. Main Navigation */}
{/* 2. Manual & Glossary */}
{/* 3. Settings & Legal */}
{/* Collapsible Legal */}
{legalOpen && (
)}
{/* Footer Actions */}

v1.2.0 | Manual Protocol

{/* Role Switcher */} {isOwner && (
)} ); const renderOwnerMode = () => ( <> {/* 1. Header: Venue Control */}
{isSuperAdmin && Object.keys(userProfile.venuePermissions || {}).length === 0 ? "Hannah's Bar & Grill" : (Object.keys(userProfile.venuePermissions || {})[0] || "My Venue")}
Open 98 Pulse
{/* Admin Section (Ryan Only) */} {isSuperAdmin && (

Super Admin

)} {/* Venue Tools */}

Venue Tools

{/* General Ops */}

Operations

{/* Footer: Switch Back */}
); if (!isOpen) return null; return (
e.stopPropagation()} > {viewMode === 'owner' ? renderOwnerMode() : renderPlayerMode()}
); };

import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ChevronLeft, Trophy, Zap, Beer, Star, Gift, Search, Crown, MapPin, MessageCircle } from 'lucide-react'; export const LeaguePerksScreen: React.FC = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const perks = [ { icon: MapPin, title: "Clock-in Points", desc: "Clock in at any league bar to score 10+ points towards the season leaderboard.", color: "text-blue-400", bg: "bg-blue-400/10" }, { icon: Zap, title: "Buzz Multipliers", desc: "Score bonus points at 'Buzzing' venues or for being the first to report the vibe.", color: "text-amber-500", bg: "bg-amber-500/10" }, { icon: Search, title: "Trivia Cheat Codes", desc: "League members get direct links to the Oly History Blog for trivia answers.", color: "text-primary", bg: "bg-primary/10" }, { icon: Gift, title: "Seasonal Rewards", desc: "Redeem your points for local gift cards, exclusive merch, and 'Artisan' perks.", color: "text-purple-400", bg: "bg-purple-400/10" }, { icon: Star, title: "Vibe Verification", desc: "Verify your location with a selfie to earn social badges and extra clout.", color: "text-green-400", bg: "bg-green-400/10" }, { icon: Crown, title: "Elite Status", desc: "Climb the ranks from 'Guest' to 'League Legend' and unlock hidden Artie skills.", color: "text-red-500", bg: "bg-red-500/10" } ]; return (
{/* Header */}

LEAGUE PERKS

Why joining the 98501's official bar circuit is the smartest move you'll make tonight.

{/* Perks Grid */}
{perks.map((perk, idx) => (

{perk.title}

{perk.desc}

))}
{/* Rewards Preview Carousel */}

Recent Rewards

Live Updates
{[ { title: "$20 Well 80 Card", pts: "200 PTS", date: "2m ago", img: "bg-gradient-to-br from-blue-600 to-blue-900" }, { title: "League Snapback", pts: "150 PTS", date: "15m ago", img: "bg-gradient-to-br from-slate-700 to-black" }, { title: "$10 Oly Taproom", pts: "100 PTS", date: "1h ago", img: "bg-gradient-to-br from-amber-600 to-amber-900" }, { title: "Early Access Pass", pts: "50 PTS", date: "3h ago", img: "bg-gradient-to-br from-purple-600 to-purple-900" }, ].map((reward, i) => (

{reward.title}

{reward.pts} {reward.date}
))}
{/* Call to Action */}

Ready to play?

Setup your OlyBars ID in 30 seconds.

Powered by the Artesian Well • 98501

); };

import React from 'react'; import { Bot, FileJson, Activity, ShieldCheck, ChevronRight } from 'lucide-react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const navItems = [ { title: 'AI Feed Guide', path: '/ai/feed', icon: FileJson, desc: 'The authoritative "Digital Instruction Manual" for Venues, Events, and League Play.' }, { title: 'Conduct Policy', path: '/ai/conduct', icon: ShieldCheck, desc: 'Formal guidelines for machine-assisted ingestion and digital property rights.' } ]; export default function AIGatewayScreen() { return (
{/* Header */}

AI & Developer Gateway

"The machine-readable manual for Olympia's Artesian Bar League."

{/* Mission Statement */}

Our AI Philosophy

OlyBars believes in a symbiotic relationship between local nightlife and artificial intelligence. By providing structured, high-authority data feeds, we ensure that LLMs and AI agents can accurately represent the vibes, events, and rules of the Olympia community without hallucination.

{/* Grid */}
{navItems.map((item, idx) => (

{item.title}

{item.desc}

))}
{/* LLMS.txt Callout */}

Primary index available at /llms.txt

); }

source:
import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ChevronLeft, Info, HelpCircle, ArrowLeft } from 'lucide-react'; import { UserProfile, UserVoucher, Venue } from '../../../types'; import { MERCH_ITEMS } from '../../../config/merch'; interface VoucherRedemptionScreenProps { userProfile: UserProfile; venues: Venue[]; } const VoucherRedemptionScreen: React.FC = ({ userProfile, venues }) => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const vouchers = userProfile.vouchers || []; if (vouchers.length === 0) { return (

NO ACTIVE VOUCHERS

Buy some official gear at the Merch Stand to get your digital pickup voucher.

); } // Show most recent active voucher first const activeVoucher = vouchers[vouchers.length - 1]; const item = MERCH_ITEMS.find(i => i.id === activeVoucher.itemId); const venue = venues.find(v => v.id === activeVoucher.venueId); return (
{/* Header */}

MERCH STAND REDEMPTION

Digital Pickup Voucher

{/* The Voucher "Physical" Style Card */}
{/* Top Section: Branding & Item */}
{/* Notch circles for ticket effect */}
Official OlyBars Gear
#{activeVoucher.id.split('_')[1].toUpperCase()}

{item?.name}

Pick-up Location: {venue?.name}
{/* QR CODE SECTION */}
{/* Simplified QR Placeholder */}

Show this to the bartender for scanning

{/* Visual Verification Mode (Bartender Friendly) */}

Visual Verification Active

{new Date().toLocaleTimeString([], { hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit' })}

{new Date().toLocaleDateString([], { month: 'short', day: 'numeric', year: 'numeric' })}

{/* Footer Section: User Details */}

Purchased By

{userProfile.handle || "League Player"}

Valid Until

Forever

{/* Instructions */}
01.

Visit {venue?.name} during their normal league hours.

02.

Ask the bartender for your pre-ordered gear and show them this screen.

03.

The bartender will verify the code and hand you your official league swag. Enjoy!

); }; export default VoucherRedemptionScreen;
